metadata.entity_description: Rachel Green is a central character in the TV sitcom Friends, a fashion enthusiast.

events.title: Leaves Barry at the altar
events.description: Flees wedding to Barry Farber, runs to Central Perk in wedding dress, starts new life.

events.title: Starts at Central Perk
events.description: Takes first job as waitress at Central Perk coffeehouse, gains independence.

events.title: Cuts father's credit cards
events.description: Dramatically slices up daddy's AmEx cards, rejects spoiled lifestyle.

events.title: First kiss with Ross
events.description: Shares passionate New Year's kiss with Ross during NYC blackout.

events.title: Parents announce separation
events.description: At fake 30th party, learns parents Dr. and Sandra Green are divorcing.

events.title: Ross confesses his love
events.description: Ross blurts 'I love you'; Rachel needs time, straining their friendship.

events.title: Declares 'on a break'
events.description: After fight, tells Ross they're 'on a break,' sleeps with Mark.
events.source: TOW Ross & Rachel Take a Break

events.title: Discovers Ross's infidelity
events.description: Learns Ross slept with Chloe; permanently breaks up with him.

events.title: Lands Bloomingdale's job
events.description: Quits Central Perk for assistant buyer role at Bloomingdale's.

events.title: Ross says her name at altar
events.description: Ross says 'Rachel' instead of 'Emily' during their wedding vows.

events.title: Flies to stop Ross's wedding
events.description: Rushes to London to confess feelings, but arrives too late.

events.title: Turns 30 years old
events.description: Celebrates milestone birthday, laments lack of achievements.

events.title: Drunken Vegas marriage to Ross
events.description: Wakes up married to Ross after wild Las Vegas night.

events.title: Meets spoiled sister Jill
events.description: Younger sister Jill Green visits, mirrors past self; offers advice.

events.title: Discovers pregnancy
events.description: Learns she's pregnant with Ross's baby from one-night stand.

events.title: Tells friends about baby
events.description: Reveals pregnancy to group; Ross thrilled, others supportive.

events.title: Ralph Lauren promotion
events.description: Secures executive buyer position at Ralph Lauren fashion house.

events.title: Gives birth to Emma
events.description: Delivers daughter Emma Geller-Green after long labor at hospital.

events.title: Sister Amy insults Emma
events.description: Older sister Amy Green visits, criticizes baby Emma's name.

events.title: Offered Paris job at Gucci
events.description: Receives dream job offer as buyer for Gucci in Paris.

events.title: Briefly dates Joey
events.description: Tries romantic relationship with Joey after years of friendship.

events.title: Ends romance with Joey
events.description: Realizes Joey friendship too valuable; they break up amicably.

events.title: Reunites with Ross forever
events.description: Chooses love over Paris job; declares 'I got off the plane' to Ross.

events.title: Keeps Ralph Lauren job in NYC
events.description: Negotiates to stay in New York instead of Paris transfer.

events.title: Marries Ross Geller
events.description: Weds Ross in beautiful NYC ceremony with friends and family.

events.title: Honeymoon in Aruba
events.description: Romantic island getaway with Ross, deepens their bond.

events.title: Emma's 4th birthday party
events.description: Hosts joyful celebration for daughter with core friend group.

events.title: Announces second pregnancy
events.description: Shares joyful news of baby boy with Ross and friends.

events.title: Birth of son Leo
events.description: Delivers healthy son Leo Geller-Green, expands family.

events.title: Emma starts kindergarten
events.description: Emotional first day drop-off, milestone for young mom.

events.title: 10th anniversary trip
events.description: Surprise Paris getaway with Ross, reignites romance.

events.title: Promoted to VP at Ralph Lauren
events.description: Achieves executive role after years of dedication.

events.title: Family endures COVID lockdown
events.description: Adapts to homeschooling kids, remote work challenges.

events.title: Emma's 18th birthday
events.description: Virtual party amid pandemic, proud mom moment.

events.title: Emma high school graduation
events.description: Cheers daughter at ceremony, reflects on growth.

events.title: Founds Green Fashion Initiative
events.description: Launches nonprofit for sustainable fashion mentoring.

events.title: Celebrates 20 years with Ross
events.description: Thriving family, career success, enduring love story.

events.title: Leo's high school graduation
events.description: Proudly watches son Leo graduate, tearful family milestone.

events.title: Family safari adventure
events.description: Thrilling African safari with Ross, Emma, Leo; bonds deepen.

events.title: Celebrates 57th birthday
events.description: Surprise party with friends; reflects on life's journey.

events.title: Publishes fashion memoir
events.description: Releases 'From Altar to Buyer' bestseller, shares story.

events.title: 20th wedding anniversary
events.description: Renew vows in intimate ceremony with closest loved ones.

events.title: Minor health scare resolved
events.description: Overcomes brief illness; appreciates health and family.

events.title: Emma's wedding day
events.description: Walks daughter Emma down aisle; emotional mother-of-bride.

events.title: Launches fashion podcast
events.description: Hosts popular series on industry trends and life lessons.

events.title: Becomes grandmother
events.description: Welcomes first grandchild from Emma; joyful new role.

events.title: Receives fashion award
events.description: Honored with Lifetime Achievement in sustainable fashion.

events.title: 60th birthday celebration
events.description: Grand party marks milestone; surrounded by family, friends.

events.title: Semi-retires from Ralph Lauren
events.description: Steps to consultant role; mentors next generation.

events.title: Reflects on 50 years post-wedding
events.description: Legacy of love, career, family; thriving in golden years.
